description: Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.
name: Superior Rune of Snowfall

bonuses: Gain 15 seconds of regeneration when you take falling damage. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 20 Seconds)</c>
Take 25% less damage from falling, and 5% of your toughness is converted into healing power.
Create a pile of snow that chills enemies when you take falling damage. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 20 Seconds)</c>
